images.mining.calc

Class CodebookProfileCalc

  • java.lang.Object
    • images.mining.calc.CodebookProfileCalc

  • public class CodebookProfileCalc
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for calculating a codebook profile for all codebook features. The idea is that different visual words occur with different probabilities in images of different classes in the data and this script can be used to quickly extract and analyze the visual word occurrence profiles.
